ygData.messageBody:
Never saw these questions, but i"m a lvl 52 Enchanter on EMarr with about 60
days played So I guess I"ll answer.



At 12th level, how does Charisma effect the length of the Charm spell?
Higher your CHA, better chance it will last longer.. Its all random.
>Is this effected by Tashan at all?
It reduces their resists so that your charm has a CHANCE to last a little
longer.

> >From 8th to 11th how well does this strategy work out on evens/yellows?
>1) Tashan
>2) Color Flux (after pet engages)
>3) Root or Blind / Fear
Do NOT waste the manna on Blind. on NPC's.
Root.. *shrugs* ok.. WTH a lil better for that lvl.

Fear? ONly if your pet is SOw'd or the MOB is snared (snare and scare)other
wise your pet wont really land many blows, but the mob will be running away
and around ALOT


> >From 12th on how well does this strategy work out on evens/yellows?
>(Using highest level pet possible per level, fully buffed)
>1) Open with Tashan
>2) After Pet engages cast "Whirl-Til"
>3) Cast Choke (optional)
>4) Med til pet starts getting hit, cast "Whirl" again
>5) Repeat 4 til mob dies
>This looks good on paper, but would it work in the game? Recast time on
>"Whirl" a factor here?
I havn't used it in a LONG time, but its a fairly quick recast, but the
spell never lasted long for me. Remember you CAN buff your pet up, AC, STR
Spells. Or other ppls spells. lvl 29 he can Dual Weild. Give him 2 weapons.
What I would suggest, it to get the mob as mad at you as you can.. have the
mob chasing you (run in circles) while the pet bash's hits, and taunts him
off you, when he's off you, reagro with a good blast. Rinse Repeat


>What good are the vials created via Thicken Mana? Are they stackable if
you
>use stackable vials? Can you use them in combat?
WASTE OF TIME, MONEY AND MANNA. Dont buy them.. Yet.


>Has anyone figured out how to use the Gem Cutter? What benefit does this
>actually have on Jewel Crafting?
No one knows about the Gem Cutter Yet. So No clue.


Countt
52 Enchie of Erollisi Marr
